headline: United Airlines Holdings (UAL) and JetBlue Finalize Blue Sky Collaboration for Expanded Loyalty Benefits
summary: United Airlines Holdings (UAL) experienced a notable price increase of approximately 34% over the last quarter, coinciding with the completion of the U.S. DOT review of its Blue Sky collaboration with JetBlue, which likely bolstered market confidence. The phased rollout of customer benefits and the interline agreement enhancing booking options potentially added positive sentiment. United's Q2 earnings showing revenue growth, albeit with decreased net income, were in line with broader market...

headline: JetBlue and United Complete DOT Review of Blue Sky Collaboration
summary: NEW YORK & CHICAGO, July 29, 2025--JetBlue (NASDAQ: JBLU) and United (NASDAQ: UAL) today announced they have completed the U.S. Department of Transportation (DOT) review of their Blue Sky collaboration and are able to proceed to implementation.

raw.headline: JetBlue and United Complete DOT Review of Blue Sky Collaboration
raw.summary: NEW YORK & CHICAGO, July 29, 2025--JetBlue (NASDAQ: JBLU) and United (NASDAQ: UAL) today announced they have completed the U.S. Department of Transportation (DOT) review of their Blue Sky collaboration and are able to proceed to implementation.
